title: How to Convince Your Parents or Grandparents that the Coronavirus is Dangerous
description: The past few weeks have been a trying time for everyone as we deal with the coronavirus pandemic  But for many people  myself included  some of the most stressful moments have come from discussing COVID   with our parents  grandparents and other older relat
